channel.title: How do i make a command menu?
channel.description: i was wondering on how to make a command menu so when ppl get on my server they type a command and the menu comes up how do i do that??

item.title: How do i make a command menu?
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

[code]	} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands"))
	{
  		sendQuest("", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("", 8145);
				sendQuest("", 8147);
                                                     sendQuest("", 8148);
				sendQuest("", 8149);
				sendQuest("", 8150);
				sendQuest("", 8151);
			             sendQuest("", 8152);
				sendQuest("", 8153);
				sendQuest("", 8154);
				sendQuest("", 8155);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}[/code]

replace that with your “lupdate”
